before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"8dg11","text":"Day 17 (D17) VmDA  and day 13 (D13) VmDA progenitors are used in this protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a8bi4","text":"This protocol outlines the cryopreservation procedure for stem cell derived neural progenitors. It can be used for the cryopreservation and long-term storage of ventral midbrain dopamine neuron progenitors at Day 13 or Day 17 of differentiation in liquid nitrogen tanks.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"c9o7t","text":"All work is to be conducted in well sterilised laminar flow hoods designated for human iPSC work where possible to minimise contamination","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9h2ge","text":"Take Mr. Frosty‱ out of  freezer and keep at   .","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6c56t","text":"Label the cryogenic vials with a label machine to include the following information: cell line, clone number, day of differentiation, freezing date and initials. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d246c","text":"Wash cells with PBS -/-","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ea8h0","text":"Put   of Accutase per cm2 of cells. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":24,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f0kuv","text":"Incubate cells at    ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fj7r7","text":"Whilst cells are incubating place   of PBS -/- into a   Falcon tube.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":34,"length":1},{"key":7,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"es5ht","text":"Remove cells from incubator and pipette up and down twice. If cells come off in large clumps place them back into the incubator for  . Repeat this step until cells form small clumps (~5cells).  If cells form small clumps after the first 4-minute incubation move straight to step 8. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":8,"offset":132,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3nc8c","text":"Place cells in the falcon tube prepared earlier (Step 6) with Ri 1:1000.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dcqqc","text":"Spin cells ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":9,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9B0AB146266811EF9DA90A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"484","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"5":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"6":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"7":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"8":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"9":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":180,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4o5em","text":"Aspirate supernatant and flick pellet twice. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e34oq","text":"Resuspend in of NBB27+ Ri (1:1000). ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9msh3","text":" Put  of cell mix into a small Eppendorf tube for cell counting.  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dgn47","text":"Add   trypan blue to cells and mix well by pipetting up and down. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"adnqn","text":" Transfer   of cells + Trypan blue mix in haemocytometer.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bgv3d","text":"Count cells in each quadrant.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6eqt6","text":"Calculate total number of cells.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pqe4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1334p","text":"Total cells = Average count of quadrants x Dilution factor x Volume (ml) x 10^4","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":79}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ack6o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9a0d1","text":"8. Calculate volume required for desired freezing concentration. We recommend freezing no less than 1x106 cells per vial. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":104,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jaul","text":"9.       Spin cells ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"4":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":180,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"893kc","text":"1.  Aspirate supernatant and flick pellet twice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24clv","text":"2. Resuspend in desired amount of Cryostor‱ CS10 for each cryovial (Calculated in Step 8 above). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b8cm2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ks2j","text":"IMPORTANT: Be fast to avoid cell death due to toxic Cryostor ‱ CS10.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":68},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":11,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9bfr4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8sne7","text":"3. Quickly aliquot of cells + Cryostor ‱ CS10 into cryovials. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5qqd6","text":"4. Put the vials in Mr.Frosty and place in the -80°C freezer as fast as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"caffu","text":"5.   after freezing, transport the cells on dry ice and store in Liquid Nitrogen for\nlong-term storage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6d3ik","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ob1o","text":"IMPORTANT: Do not store cells in the -80 freezer for longer than 1 week. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":17},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":11,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"AF985532266811EF9DA90A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"AF985532266811EF9DA90A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"AF985532266811EF9DA90A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
